channel.title: Home on MVR IT Limited
channel.description: Recent content in Home on MVR IT Limited

item.title: Big Data
item.description: MVR IT has earned the trust of customers from all around the globe, ranging from large enterprises wanting insight on their next strategic move, to start-ups looking to harness the power of data for a competitive edge. Platform Development We are a team of highly skilled engineers have extensive experience in delivering big data to enterprises around globe. Some of the engineers are open source contributors, who has passion towards open-source, data & technology.

item.title: Cyber Security
item.description: We can conduct network and software penetration testing and vulnerability analysis to ensure that your companyâ€™s virtual presence is completely protected and secure. We take extra care on cyber security and we are qualified and SANS trained pentesters. We can setup labs for your organisation and train your IT resources on cyber security.

item.title: Consulting
item.description: MVR IT can deliver Big Data solutions to companies through consulting model, where we become part of the company delivery lifecycle either on fixed budget or time/material model. This way companies can quickly gain on their deliverables. This is win-win for both, there have been huge spike with this model.
